instruction: Create 3 product recommendations for a customer who wishes to buy a laptop with advanced gaming capabilities.
output:
1. ASUS ROG Strix Scar 17: Featuring cutting-edge hardware, including an Intel i7 processor, 16GB of RAM, and an NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3080, this laptop will handle any game you choose to play. The 17-inch display also provides a great gaming experience, while the RGB keyboard and full-sized tiltable touchpad round out its impressive features. 

2. Alienware Aurora R11: This powerful laptop has a full-powered NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 Super Graphics card and 9th Gen Intel Core i7 processor, delivering exceptional performance and stunning visuals. It features an RGB keyboard and a 10th Gen Intel Core i9 processor for an even more powerful experience.

3. Lenovo Legion 5 Pro: This laptop is designed for gaming, with a 9th Gen Intel Core i7 processor and NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 Graphics enabling seamless gaming experiences. It features a 17.3-inch FHD IPS display with a 144Hz refresh rate for a smooth gaming experience and a reinforced keyboard for extra durability.
